00025 #include "CmdLightPositionModified.h"
00026 #include "tgf.h"
00027 #include "TLightKit.h"
00028 #include "Trace.h"
00029 
00030 CmdLightPositionModified::CmdLightPositionModified( TLightKit* light, QDateTime time, double longitude, double latitude, QUndoCommand* parent )
00031 :QUndoCommand( "Sun position changed", parent ), lightKit( light ), newTime( time ), newLongitude( longitude ), newLatitude( latitude )
00032 {
00033         Trace trace( "CmdLightPositionModified::CmdLightPositionModified" );
00034         
00035         if( light == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdLinghtPositionModified called with NULL TLightKit" );
00036         
00037         oldTime = light->GetTime();
00038         oldLongitude = light->longitude.getValue();
00039         oldLatitude = light->latitude.getValue();
00040 }
00041 
00042 CmdLightPositionModified::~CmdLightPositionModified()
00043 {
00044         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::~CmdLightKitModified" );
00045 }
00046 void CmdLightPositionModified::undo()
00047 {
00048         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::undo" );
00049         
00050         lightKit->longitude = oldLongitude;
00051         lightKit->latitude = oldLatitude;
00052         lightKit->ChangePosition( oldTime );
00053 }
00054 
00055 void CmdLightPositionModified::redo()
00056 {
00057         Trace trace( "CmdLightKitModified::redo" );
00058         
00059         lightKit->longitude = newLongitude;
00060         lightKit->latitude = newLatitude;
00061         lightKit->ChangePosition( newTime );
00062 }
